Posts.Content: Thank you for your advice! Much appreciated ... what kind of nail varnish do you use? What I mean ... ordinary nail vanish or is it gel based varnish? Over many, many years I used to have Gel nails. I stopped and now use nail strengthener only. So far so good! Phew though reading in the forum I will now have dark nail varnish just don't know which type of this makes sense? Thank you again.
Posts.Title: Confused... light or dark nail varnish during chemo?

Posts.Content: This is really helpful, Ruby! Thanks for your quick response. I appreciate it. I am off to have a manicure now. I will be daring ... I used to wear red nails for 2 decades! From red to black to gold : ) Much love, Claudia
Posts.Title: Confused... light or dark nail varnish during chemo?
